entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:40 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 2:52 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: WNW 50 km/h gust 84 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Local blowing snow near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
